overview:
Redgee Capili is the Chief Privacy Officer and Vice President of Business Services at Comcast Silicon Valley. Redgee joined Comcast via their acquisition of Plaxo in 2008, where he managed Information Technology and Customer Support.

Redgee is responsible for the continued development and implementation of Plaxo’s data privacy policies and practices. He is also responsible for managing and delivering global-wide services, overseeing IT, Customer Care, Quality Software Assurance and Globalization/Localization

Prior to joining Plaxo, he held technology management positions at Gravitate Incorporated, GIG.COM, and California’s DDS Technology Division. He brings with him more than 18 years of information technology, software development and client services experience in the Silicon Valley.

Redgee holds a BS in Computer Science and a BA in Mathematics from San Jose State University.
